body:
@penpornk why? `transpose_nhwc_in[0].first` is input node of `transpose_nhwc` (`e->src()`), and `transpose_nhwc_in[0].second` is its corresponding slot number (`e->src_output()`). 

While `mklop_in[0]` is exactly the node `transpose_nhwc`, which will be deleted in following steps. Why we need its output slot number?
body_html:
@penpornk why? transpose_nhwc_in[0].first is input node of transpose_nhwc (e->src()), and transpose_nhwc_in[0].second is its corresponding slot number (e->src_output()).

While mklop_in[0] is exactly the node transpose_nhwc, which will be deleted in following steps. Why we need its output slot number?
